alert.note: Alert for Central Cook; DuPage; Northern Cook (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Chicago (Northeastern Illinois and Northwestern Indiana)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 31 at 1:48AM CDT by NWS Chicago
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern DuPage and northeastern Cook Counties through 215 AM CDT... At 148 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Western Springs, or over La Grange, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Chicago, Cicero, Evanston, Skokie, Des Plaines, Oak Lawn, Berwyn, Wheaton, Oak Park, Downers Grove, Glenview, Elmhurst, Lombard, Ohare Airport, Park Ridge, Addison, Niles, West Town, Chicago Lawn and Englewood. Including the following interstates... I-55 between mile markers 276 and 294. I-88 between mile markers 129 and 140. I-90 between mile markers 77 and 102. I-94 between mile markers 34 and 60. I-290 between mile markers 10 and 29. I-294 between mile markers 34 and 60. I-355 between mile markers 19 and 27. This includes... Brookfield Zoo, Lincoln Park Zoo, Loyola University, SeatGeek Stadium, Triton College, University of Chicago, College of DuPage, Hawthorne Park, Morton Arboretum, Northeastern Illinois University, Northwestern University, Soldier Field, University of Illinois Chicago, Guaranteed Rate Field...IL Institute of Technology, Wrigley Field, The Loop, Museum of Science and Industry, Museum Campus, and Northerly Island. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
